stp_details.scheme_name: HDFC HYBRID DEBT FUND - DIRECT PLAN - GROWTH OPTION

swp_details.scheme_name: HDFC HYBRID DEBT FUND - DIRECT PLAN - GROWTH OPTION

meta_title: HDFC Hybrid Debt Fund Direct Growth - Groww
meta_desc: HDFC Hybrid Debt Fund Direct Growth is Conservative Hybrid Hybrid mutual fund with risk-reward rating of 4/10. It has track record of 11 years, with three year return of 11.04. Risk is Moderately High
scheme_name: HDFC Hybrid Debt Fund Direct Growth
exit_load: Exit load for units in excess of 15% of the investment, 1% will be charged for redemption within 1 year
description: The scheme seeks to generate income/capital appreciation by investing primarily in debt securities, money market instruments and moderate exposure to equities.
benchmark_name: NIFTY 50 Hybrid Composite Debt 15:85 Conservative Index

analysis.analysis_desc: Consistently higher annualised returns than category average for the past 1Y, 3Y, 5Y and 10Y

Higher alpha: 2.69 
The fund has generated returns higher than benchmark - NIFTY 50 Hybrid Composite Debt 15:85 Conservative Index - in the last 3Y

amc_info.name: HDFC Mutual Fund
amc_info.address: "HDFC House", 2nd Floor, H. T. Parekh Marg, 165-166, BackbayReclamation, Churchgate Mumbai 400020
amc_info.description: HDFC Mutual Fund started their mutual fund on 30/06/2000 and its managing total assets of ₹2,70,046 Cr. Its ranked at 2 as per total assets at end of 30th Sep 2017.
amc_info.more_description:
It is the largest asset management company (AMC) in the country (as per average assets under management as on 31 December 2018 of Rs. 339,178 Crores

Launched on the 10th of December, 1999, HDFC Asset Management Company Ltd. is among the most popular fund houses in India. The company offers an extensive range of mutual funds and is home to some of the most trustworthy fund managers who ensure that your hard-earned money is invested in the right schemes. Whether you seek growth funds, income funds, or even retirement funds, HDFC AMC Ltd. has it all.

HDFC Mutual Fund has left no stone unturned to cater to investors from all walks of life. Be it any financial goal – long-term, short-term, retirement, tax-saving and so on – HDFC has that plan for you.

category_info.tax_impact: Returns are taxed as per your Income Tax slab.
category_info.description: Invest predominantly in Government Securities(minimum 80% of total assets). They are relatively more risky than the other debt funds due to fluctuating interest rates.

historic_exit_loads.note: Exit load for units in excess of 15% of the investment, 1% will be charged for redemption within 1 year
Exit load of 1.50% if redeemed within 12 months, 1% if redeemed after 12 months but within 24 months and 0.50% if redeemed after 24 months but within 36 months
Exit load of 2% if redeemed within 12 months, 1% if redeemed after 12 months but within 24 months and 0.50% if redeemed after 24 months but within 36 months from the date of allotment
Exit load of 1% if redeemed within 18 months
Exit load of 1% if redeemed within 1 year
